title: Cognitive Load Measurement and Management Strategies in Problem-Based Learning (PBL)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device proficiency and interest in solving social issues
context.additional_context: Learners participate in PBL scenarios solving community problems through VR simulations, learning to measure and optimize cognitive load

learning_goals: Learners can utilize tools to measure their cognitive load (intrinsic/extrinsic/germane load) in a PBL environment.
Learners can apply at least two strategies to manage cognitive load in VR simulation-based PBL.
Learners can evaluate and adjust the distribution of cognitive load during team-based problem-solving processes.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
